text: Kananjalo ningabi nje ngomfazi okhulula umsonto asele ewolukile emveni kokuba ubusele uqinile, ngokuthabatha izifungo zenu zibe yindlela yokukhohlisa phakathi kwenu, kuba hleze uhlanga oluthile lube luninzi kakhulu kunolunye uhlanga.
